languages.text: "Неумирающий указывал, а я — вел. Встреча с тобой, Домин, и твоим миром. Охота на Немезита, что есть ее мрачный и уродливый двойник, постижение боли паствы ее... Поручения мои селили в душе моей дочери неспокойствие. Как и должно было быть".

"The Undying One laid the thread, and I served as guide. The meeting with you and your world, Domin. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий указывал, а я — вел. Встреча с тобой, Домин, и твоим миром. Охота на Немезита, что есть ее мрачный и уродливый двойник, постижение боли паствы ее... Поручения мои селили в душе моей дочери неспокойствие. Как и должно было быть".

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One pointed the way, and I was the guide. The meeting with you and your world, Enim. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."

"The Undying One pointed the way, and I was the guide. The meeting with you and your world, Enim. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."

"The Undying One laid the thread, and I served as guide. The meeting with you and your world, Domin. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."

"The Undying One laid the thread, and I served as guide. The meeting with you and your world, Domin. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."

"The Undying One laid the thread, and I served as guide. The meeting with you and your world, Domin. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."

"The Undying One laid the thread, and I served as guide. The meeting with you and your world, Domin. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."

languages.text: « L'Immortel a déroulé le fil, et j'ai servi de guide. Sa rencontre avec vous et votre monde, Domin. La traque de Némésite, son double sinistre et malveillant. La compréhension de la souffrance de ses futures ouailles... Toutes les missions que je lui ai confiées ont attisé les flammes de son tourment, comme de juste. »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One laid the thread, and I served as guide. The meeting with you and your world, Domin. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."

traits.locale_text: « L'Immortel a déroulé le fil, et j'ai servi de guide. Sa rencontre avec vous et votre monde, Domin. La traque de Némésite, son double sinistre et malveillant. La compréhension de la souffrance de ses futures ouailles... Toutes les missions que je lui ai confiées ont attisé les flammes de son tourment, comme de juste. »

languages.text: «El Inmortal tejió el hilo y yo serví de guía. El encuentro con usted y su mundo, Domin. La caza de Nemesitio, su sombrío y espantoso doble. Que comprendiese el dolor por el que pasa su rebaño... Mis tareas despertaron la ansiedad en el alma de mi hija. Así debía ser».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One laid the thread, and I served as guide. The meeting with you and your world, Domin. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."

traits.locale_text: «El Inmortal tejió el hilo y yo serví de guía. El encuentro con usted y su mundo, Domin. La caza de Nemesitio, su sombrío y espantoso doble. Que comprendiese el dolor por el que pasa su rebaño... Mis tareas despertaron la ansiedad en el alma de mi hija. Así debía ser».

languages.text: 「不死の者が糸を引いて、私は案内役を務めました。あなたとあなたの世界いを引き合わせたのです、ドミン。ネメサイト探しと、彼女の不気味で恐ろしいドッペルゲンガー。群れの痛みに対する理解…私の任務は、娘の魂に眠る不安をかき立てること。それが目的だったのです」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One laid the thread, and I served as guide. The meeting with you and your world, Domin. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者が糸を引いて、私は案内役を務めました。あなたとあなたの世界いを引き合わせたのです、ドミン。ネメサイト探しと、彼女の不気味で恐ろしいドッペルゲンガー。群れの痛みに対する理解…私の任務は、娘の魂に眠る不安をかき立てること。それが目的だったのです」

languages.text: “不死之神做好安排，而我担任向导的角色。无论是她与您的相遇，进入您的世界，秘者，还是猎杀涅墨斯特，那个与她的经历如此相似的宿敌，又或是理解牧群的痛苦……我布置的任务让我女儿的灵魂中充满了焦虑，这些任务的目的正是如此。”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One laid the thread, and I served as guide. The meeting with you and your world, Domin. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."

traits.locale_text: “不死之神做好安排，而我担任向导的角色。无论是她与您的相遇，进入您的世界，秘者，还是猎杀涅墨斯特，那个与她的经历如此相似的宿敌，又或是理解牧群的痛苦……我布置的任务让我女儿的灵魂中充满了焦虑，这些任务的目的正是如此。”

languages.text: "Der Todlose hat den Faden ausgelegt, und ich habe als Führer gedient. Die Begegnung mit Euch und Eurer Welt, Domin. Die Jagd nach Nemesit, ihr grauenhafter und fürchterlicher Doppelgänger. Die Erkenntnis, welchen Schmerz ihre Gemeinde empfindet ... Meine Aufträge haben in der Seele meiner Tochter Unruhe genährt. Genau, wie es vorgesehen war."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One laid the thread, and I served as guide. The meeting with you and your world, Domin. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."

traits.locale_text: "Der Todlose hat den Faden ausgelegt, und ich habe als Führer gedient. Die Begegnung mit Euch und Eurer Welt, Domin. Die Jagd nach Nemesit, ihr grauenhafter und fürchterlicher Doppelgänger. Die Erkenntnis, welchen Schmerz ihre Gemeinde empfindet ... Meine Aufträge haben in der Seele meiner Tochter Unruhe genährt. Genau, wie es vorgesehen war."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen, ipliği ördü. Ben de kılavuz olarak hizmet verdim. Domin, sizinle ve dünyanızla tanışmamız... Nemezit avı, onun zalim ve hastalıklı taklitçisi, sürüsünün acılarını idrak ediş şekli... Vazifelerim, kızımın ruhunda yatan endişeyi uyandırdı. Olması gereken de buydu."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One laid the thread, and I served as guide. The meeting with you and your world, Domin. The hunt for Nemesite, her grim and ghastly doppelganger. The comprehension of her flock's pain... My assignments stirred anxiety in my daughter's soul. As they were meant to."
